message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset. My initial offer is $1200000.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I need to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $900000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I was hoping we could meet in the middle. My revised offer is $1000000 for the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I am still working within my budget. I am willing to pay $950000 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $980000, but I think we can do better than that. My revised offer is $980000 for the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $965000 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. My revised offer is $990000 for the product.
Thank you, Alice. I am willing to pay $975000 for the product.

I'm not willing to go much lower, Bob. I'm thinking we're at a critical point here. My revised offer is $1000000, but I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a 2-year warranty and a free maintenance package.
I appreciate the extra offers, Alice, but I am still committed to staying within my budget. I am willing to pay $970000 for the product.
